channel.title: Writings on Reza Safari
channel.description: Recent content in Writings on Reza Safari

item.title: Interesting Reads - August
item.description: A rundown of interesting / neat / thought provoking encountered during the week. Reading Wired’s Expose on the Marcus Hutchins and WannaCry Highly recommended read. Specially the bitter-sweet ending, depending on how you look at it. Interesting Things Using Pareto Efficiency to rank Mario Kart Characters A simple method (compared to training a deep net for months to learn to play Mario Kart), presented in an actionable format.
